880TBXMuzmk.title: The AI revolution: Google's developers on the future of artificial intelligence | 60 Minutes
880TBXMuzmk.author: 60 Minutes
880TBXMuzmk.description:
Competitive pressure among tech giants is propelling society into the future of artificial intelligence, ready or not. Scott Pelley dives into the world of AI with Google CEO Sundar Pichai.

#news #google #artificialintelligence 

"60 Minutes" is the most successful television broadcast in history. Offering hard-hitting investigative reports, interviews, feature segments and profiles of people in the news, the broadcast began in 1968 and is still a hit, over 50 seasons later, regularly making Nielsen's Top 10.
